name: ampharosite
effect: Held: Allows Ampharos to Mega Evolve into Mega Ampharos.
short_effect: Held: Allows Ampharos to Mega Evolve into Mega Ampharos.

flavor_text_entries.x-y:
One variety of the mysterious Mega Stones.
Have Ampharos hold it, and this stone will
enable it to Mega Evolve during battle.
